Today we enacted the Law on Quality Assurance of Education created by the Superintendence and the Quality Agency.
Quality education for all is the main instrument for achieving greater equality of opportunities and defeating poverty.
It is also an instrument to promote social mobility, the spiritual and material progress of people and the development of the country.
Our commitment: 40% of the most vulnerable children and young people with academic merit have guaranteed scholarships for higher education.
Our commitment is to improve the credit with the State's endorsement and to reschedule the delinquent debtors of the solidarity fund.

@FoundationJM Is "enjoying" = no job to the locals from investors?
and "not enjoying" = no foreign investors to operate?;what do you mean ?
@FoundationJM Your Qn:Do Tanzania Labour Laws protect citizens when it comes to getting jobs from foreign investors?(S.A & Kenya inclusive)
@FoundationJM Our discussion could go further,deeper into ratios and privileges from the recruitment process to the employee's package.
@FoundationJM I have been there and I am still convinced we have enough laws on it.Implementation is a collective responsibility.
@FoundationJM Exactly.Enforcement is a collective task.You can prosecute but before that is done,there's a process and that's collective.
@FoundationJM Within that process,you might realize that a particular unit doesn't work in getting proper results for the law.You change it.
@FoundationJM Identifying.What works for the people and what doesn't.What we thought could work but didn't and why and what should be done.
@FoundationJM If there's a law and in one of our villages out of 30 regions a particular institution fails to adhere it.What do you do?
@FoundationJM Have you reported any case on violation of labour laws to the authorities entrusted in that?What was the response?
@FoundationJM It's an option.Going further into that,a focus on frequencies of reshuffles as I have been doing on regular basis.
@FoundationJM Efficiency in that should then focus on the frequencies of reshuffles.Well planned,screened,experience taken into account.
